channel.title: Boostrap error
channel.description:
Hallo. After an hour of working suddenly an error table appeared in Gateway: Tor bootstrap error, whonixcheck exit after 0 sec. Is host connection working? Do you live in censored area? . . . (I forgot to printscreen it) I didnt notice whonixcheck was running before in Gateway.
So I started whonixcheck and it showed no error, connected to tor. Also in workstation everything worked before, no failures. Did all my traffic went thru tor safely?

item.title: Boostrap error
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This does not indicate leaks. Only temporary network failure.

Read full topic
